1.title: Donus
1.plot: The crew come back to Kirecburnu. Things have changed in their absence. They want to make everything like they used to be.

2.title: Yeni Hayat
2.plot: Mecnun decides to make big changes in his life. He wants to get a job and earn money.

3.title: Kabullenis
3.plot: Mecnun starts working in Omer's store. He meets Hidayet.

4.title: Seviyorum Be Abi!
4.plot: Mecnun is in depression because he thinks that Leyla loves someone else. Erdal Bakkal is angry because no one goes to his store anymore.

5.title: Hukuk
5.plot: Hidayet is in jail. Mecnun wants to save him in order to impress Leyla.

6.title: Vay Be
6.plot: Mecnun tries to get close with Leyla but he fails every time. Erdal Bakkal buys a car.

7.title: Her Giden Biraz Degisir
7.plot: Pakize comes back from Germany. No one recognizes her but Iskender.

8.title: Is Adami
8.plot: There are some misunderstandings in the neighborhood. Ismail Abi finds a new job.

9.title: Kelepce
9.plot: Leyla is sick of the troubles that Mecnun causes. She goes to court for this situation and Mecnun gets a punishment. He has to wear an electronic handcuff which gives him a shock if he is around Leyla.

10.title: Vicdan
10.plot: There is a voice that can be heard from all around the world and scientists think it comes from Istanbul. Scientists go to Istanbul in order to find out the source of the voice.

11.title: Zaman
11.plot: Mecnun wants to know Leyla better so, he travels through time in order to see her past.

12.title: Dilek Tasi
12.plot: Azsakalli Dede is about to die. The crew want to find his family but they find something else. They find a map in a wooden box which shows the place of a wish-stone.

13.title: Mecnun ve Is
13.plot: Mecnun and Ismail Abi find a new job. Yavuz meets a new thief.

14.title: Rusya
14.plot: Mecnun and Leyla are engaged but Benjamin and Hidayet have another plan.

15.title: Arabesk
15.plot: Arabesque is forbidden in the country. Benjamin and Arda's father produce a new drug and start selling it to people. This drug makes people believe in memories that never happened and give them a fake happiness.

16.title: Zengin Sinif
16.plot: Leyla and Mecnun start spending time with rich people while Yavuz is getting close with the new thief.

17.title: Orhanlar
17.plot: Leyla's company is about to bankrupt. They decide to organize a concert of Orhan Gencebay and hope to make a lot of money with this concert.

18.title: Kirecburnu Cakallari
18.plot: Erdal Bakkal creates a website for his store. The crew want to find money for Leyla's company.

19.title: Gecmis
19.plot: Erdal Bakkal has weird nightmares. Iskender and Omer are threatened by their past. Mecnun hears voices in his head.

20.title: Market
20.plot: There is a big hurricane that is coming to Istanbul. Mecnun and Leyla get stuck in a closed shop.

21.title: Ayrilik Korkusu
21.plot: Leyla and Mecnun have nightmares for breaking up with each other. Yavuz discovers something about his past.

22.title: Efsaneler
22.plot: Hidayet kidnaps Leyla to a magical place where it can be traveled both to a place and through time by mirrors. Mecnun thinks he can save her with the mirror of King Arthur and he starts searching it.

23.title: Ölüm
23.plot: The Death comes to Kirecburnu and he wants to take someone's life before he leaves. The crew have to choose who will die.

24.title: Nigde
24.plot: Leyla and Omer move to Nigde. Mecnun wants to find her address but he can't. Finally, he decides to make spiritual journey in order to find her.

25.title: Melül'ün Yolu
25.plot: Melul suddenly dies and everyone thinks that this is a murder. The crew try to find the murderer.

26.title: I. Metonya meydan muharebesi
26.plot: Metin stays in Iskender's house and he makes problems for everyone. He doesn't let anyone sleep in the nights and he drinks a lot. Iskender wants to get Metonya back in order to get rid of Metin.

27.title: Yavuz'un Vedasi
27.plot: Yavuz gets shot by an arrow. He is in coma. The crew look for someone who can save him.

28.title: Dosto Asik Olursa
28.plot: Dosto goes out every night. He doesn't write anymore. He meets a woman in a pub and feels in love. The tree on Omer's head grows.

29.title: Yoklugunda
29.plot: Mecnun forgets Leyla's birthday. He wants to find a meaningful present for his apology.

30.title: Makine
30.plot: Erdal Bakkal finds a machine under his house. This machine says that the end of the world is coming and the crew only have twenty four hours to stop it.

31.title: Gelecek
31.plot: Leyla and Mecnun find themselves in 4000 after the machine explodes. The crew travel to future in order to find them but they go to wrong year. They are in 3000. In both years, there is a man called the shadow who controls the world.

32.title: Anne
32.plot: Iskender has a heart attack. Mecnun starts driving taxi instead of his dad. He meets a mysterious old woman.

33.title: Sans
33.plot: Hidayet's mother and Hidayet start living together. There is a girl in the neighborhood and she doesn't speak at all. She just smiles and brings luck to person she is smiling to.

34.title: Fedakarlik
34.plot: Iskender loses his house because of his debts. They can't find anywhere to stay so they go to a park. Erdal Bakkal steals Dosto's laptop. Hidayet's mother try to know Leyla better.

35.title: Seviyorsan Üzme, Sevmiyorsan Oynama
35.plot: Erdal, Yavuz and Metin are in madhouse. They escape from there and start rebellion against sanity and its supporters. Leyla finds a job but she gets fired because of Mecnun. Iskender is sick and tired of troubles Mecnun makes for Leyla.

36.title: Kill Bilal
36.plot: Mecnun breaks up with Leyla and he wants to find a new girlfriend in order to forget her. Erdal Bakkal continues his rebellion against sanity. Hidayet's mother chases a man called Bilal.

37.title: Tom Waits
37.plot: Hidayet is in coma. The doctor tries everything to save him. Leyla makes a big deal with a company. If she can organize a concert of Tom Waits, she will get lots of money and this means she can save her own company.

38.title: Kahramanlik
38.plot: Mecnun thinks that Leyla woos Hidayet because everyone believes Hidayet is a hero. Mecnun wants to prove that he is hero too and he saved the world before. Arda's father has some bad plans to take control of the world.

39.title: Kireçburnu'nun 100. Kurtulus Yili
39.plot: Hidayet is in coma again. The doctor needs papers from a century ago to heal Hidayet. Menun travels back in time in order to get these papers from the doctor's grandfather before he destroys them.

40.title: Para Kazanmak
40.plot: Mecnun thinks that nobody respects him. He talks about this situation with Metin and he decides to get a job and listen Metin's advice. Suna is chased by her past.

41.title: Falci
41.plot: Leyla and Mecnun have some concerns about the future of their relationship. They want to know if they will still be together in the future. They travel to future separately to find the answer. Leyla is shocked by what she saw.

42.title: Giden Döner mi?
42.plot: Leyla and Mecnun decide to go to another place to make a new start. Yavuz and Eylul are getting married. Gotik Leyla meets someone. A surprise is on the way for Erdal Bakkal.

43.title: Bir Hikayeyi Sonlandirmak, Bir Hikayeyi Baslatmaktan Daha Zordur
43.plot: We take a look at the times right after Leyla's death. Mecnun doesn't speak at all. Yavuz tries to hold on to life in the jail. Erdal Bakkal makes plans for a short vacation with his family.

11.plot: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

12.title: Cesek
12.plot: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

13.title: Fake to the Future
13.plot: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

14.title: Evler
14.plot: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

15.title: Arda'nin Dügünü
15.plot: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

16.title: Clone Wars
16.plot: Arda's father works with a crazy professor. Together, they start cloning people.

17.title: Sekerpare
17.plot: Ismail meets a woman and he fells in love. He doesn't know what to do in this situation so he wants help from his friends.

18.title: Arda Kalan
18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

19.title: Benjamin
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Hoscakal
20.plot: Leyla decides to go to United States and Mecnun can't make her change her decision.

1.title: Ramadan Is Coming
1.plot: Leyla is in U.S.A. Mecnun is so depressed about this and he wants to bring her back with Dede's help.

2.title: Yozgat
2.plot: Aksakalli Dede is lost. Mecnun wants to find him. He discovers that Leyla is kidnapped. Benjamin makes Mecnun see weird dreams.

3.title: Mecnun
3.plot: Leyla is kidnapped and Mecnun wants to save her. He learns everything was just a game. When he learns everyone was in the game, Mecnun shoots himself in the head.

4.title: Beyin
4.plot: Mecnun is in coma. The crew enter Mecnun's subconscious in order to save him.

5.title: Nurten'in Yegeni
5.plot: Mecnun suddenly decides to marry Nurten's niece. Everyone is shocked by this decision.

6.title: Evlenme
6.plot: Mecnun suddenly changes his mind. He doesn't want to marry Nurten's niece anymore but brothers of the bride force him for marriage.

7.title: Uzay
7.plot: Aliens, who have no feelings, come to the earth to investigate about love. When they see the love between Leyla and Mecnun, they decide to kidnap them.

8.title: Baz Istasyonu
8.plot: The cell site, which Erdal has gotten, causes a big complication in the galactic system. Planets changes their places and because of that some changes happen in the world. Everyone has different personality except Leyla, Mecnun and Ismail.

9.title: Illuzyon Nasil Ki Bir Goz Yanilmasiysa, Ask da Bir Gonul Yanilmasidir
9.plot: Leyla eavesdrops a conversation of Mecnun and assumes that Mecnun doesn't want to be with her anymore.

10.title: Kimi Vedalarda Hoscakal Denilmez!
10.plot: Zeynep abandons the neighborhood and moves to a different city. Leyla has a big traffic accident.

11.title: Hayat, Damarlarindan Tutup Zorla Icine Ceker Insani
11.plot: Mecnun speaks for the first time, one year after Leyla's death. He still can't accept the truth so he travels through time with Dede in order to save her.

12.title: Sari Biyik
12.plot: Leyla's organs were donated by her family. Arda's father kidnaps all the people who has Leyla's organs. He wants to create a Leyla for Arda. Mecnun meets Sedef and Sirin.

13.title: Gercek Kesik
13.plot: Ismail sells his organs for money. Mecnun seeks the person who has Leyla's heart. Erdal Bakkal is kidnapped.

14.title: Erdal Bakkal ve Ciraklari
14.plot: Mecnun gets close with Sedef and Sirin. Iskender, Ismail and Yavuz start working in Erdal Bakkal as pupils.

15.title: Hayal Kirikliklari Muzesi
15.plot: Mecnun is about to marry Sirin. There are two different Dede. Everyone has a big disappointment.

16.title: Askin Formulu
16.plot: There are six unsolved math problems in the world. There is one million dollar reward for each problem. Everyone tries to solve these problems. Mecnun also tries to find the formula of love.

17.title: Marduk
17.plot: A big meteor, which name is Marduk, is about collide with the world. The Maya calendar reaches its last date. Everyone assumes that this is the end of the world. Mecnun and his friends try to stop the world from ending.

18.title: Sir
18.plot: Mecnun finds the truth about Sedef's father. Sirin sees Aksakalli Dede in her dream and she wants to find out if Aksakalli Dede is real.

19.title: Hosgeldin 2013
19.plot: Mecnun seeks to find the flower of fairy tales. There is a big new year party at Mecnun's house.

20.title: Masal Cicegi
20.plot: Mecnun loves Sirin and Sedef loves Mecnun. No one knows what to do about this situation.

21.title: Yavuz Nasil Kurtulur?
21.plot: Yavuz gets caught during a robbery and goes to jail. The crew make a plan to save him from the jail.

22.title: Okul Yolunda
22.plot: Sedef tells Mecnun that she loves him. Erdal tells the story of how he met Nurten.

23.title: Ismail Abi
23.plot: Mecnun and Ismail have an argument. Ismail feels sorry and abandons the neighborhood. No one can find Ismail.

24.title: Mecnun'luk Istidadi
24.plot: The flower of fairy tales dries. Mecnun tries to save it.

25.title: Talih Kusu
25.plot: Iskender goes to jail. Everyone is frustrated about this situation. The crew make a plan to rescue Iskender while he is threatened in the jail.

26.title: Made in Metonya
26.plot: Mecnun learns that Sedef's old name was Leyla. Yavuz falls in love. Metin has founded a state, which is called Metonya. He gives a big reward for people who want to be a citizen of his country. Erdal goes to Metonya.

27.title: Ardadan
27.plot: Mecnun still can't forget Leyla. Arda's father founds a new company called Ardadan. He wants to sell people all the products of the company.

28.title: Tarihler Arasi Yolculuk
28.plot: Mecnun finds a supernatural door in Metonya. When he passes through the door, he travels through time. He goes to a different year, each time he passes the door.

29.title: Maske
29.plot: Sedef meets a new guy. The guy helps everybody and everyone loves him. Mecnun is jealous for Sedef.

30.title: Who I am?
30.plot: Mecnun tries to know himself better. Yavuz learns that Eylul doesn't love him.

31.title: Metaforya
31.plot: Sevim is kidnapped by the king of Metaforya. Metin wants to save his wife with the crew's help.

32.title: Paralel Evren
32.plot: Somehow, Mecnun travels through parallel universes. He sees a different life of himself in each one.

33.title: Baba Olmak
33.plot: Nurten is pregnant. Erdal has fears about being a father.

34.title: Drakulluk Edene Yaziklar Olsun
34.plot: Dracula comes to Kirecburnu. Everyone turns into a vampire but Mecnun and Iskender. Mecnun wants to end this madness.

35.title: Hayalet Avcilari
35.plot: There are some ghosts in the neighborhood. The crew tries to hunt them. Mecnun has to make a decision between Sedef and Sirin.

36.title: Mecnun Harikalar Diyarinda
36.plot: Everyone turns into a character from different fairy tales. Mecnun wants to find his princess.

37.title: Bela
37.plot: There are a lot of problems the crew needs to deal.

38.title: Ama Babacigim
38.plot: Eylul's father is about to die but Eylul doesn't believe him. She thinks that he lies like always. Yavuz, Mecnun, Ismail and Iskender start working at the house of Eylul's father.

39.title: Niyetci
39.plot: Sirin wants to be with Mecnun again. She and Arda's father have some bad plans. They decide to use Ismail for their plans and give him a new job.

40.title: Karabasan
40.plot: Arda's father steals Aksakalli Dede's wand. He wants to make people live in a world of nightmares. The crew tries to get the wand back.

41.title: Dagilis
41.plot: Sedef, Sirin and Eylul abandons the neighborhood. Everyone is so desperate about their relationships.

imdb.title: Leyla and Mecnun
plot: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, _Leyla and Mecnun_ (qv) is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between _Leyla and Mecnun_ (qv).::ahmetkozan
synopsis:
Leyla ile Mecnun is probably the first surreal comedy that reached masses. It is a revolutionary step towards breaching the wall between popular entertainment and art in Turkey. Although this may sound exaggerating, it is actually an understatement, because the wall is both broken both ways. What makes art a piece of art and what makes an entertainment entertaining, is very openly demonstrated. People who believe art is just a discrimination where no one speaks the truth "the King is naked" will probably start appreciating art more than they did after they watch this series. And vice versa, people who do not enjoy many pieces of work simply because they are popular/emotional, can find themselves blown into this.The main story evolves around a guy (Mecnun) who falls in love with the daughter (Leyla) of his father's childhood friend. However, in line with the most popular global TV series of this millennium, the main characters do not dominate the story at all. Especially in the 2nd season, this fact strengthens. Mecnun's father, his closest friends, the owner of the local market, the thief of the neighborhood become inseparable parts of the story as it evolves.There is much to tell, but elaborating on what this TV series is really about should suffice. It is about love and the pain it is proceeded by. It is about how love can evolve one's perspective of life & universe. It is about how one can recover even from the deepest pain. It is about friendship, but a more eastern, more genuine version of it. It is about fathers and sons and the unconditional love of the father towards his son. It is about how laughter and depression can crowd each other. It is about how complex characters possessing opposite characteristics that are extremely polar, and how those characteristics can blend into someone in reality. It is about good and evil. It is about life and afterlife.As mentioned before, it is surreal. When you see the characters eating grapes to demonstrate they are drinking wine in reality, and chewing gum in the same way to replace cigarettes, you can appreciate how one can tell something by being open about it and with no harm done at the same time. Children watching think they are are chewing gum, adults appreciate they are smoking. Perfect.I really feel bad for those who do not speak Turkish and cannot appreciate this wonderful work of life. Please find below the preceding synopsis:The story is about the love between Leyla and Mecnun that's based on the Turkish adaptation of the famous Arabic love-story "Layla and Majnun", written by the Azeri poet Fuzuli, whom he appears in the series sometimes. The story begins when two babies, who were born on the same day, were put together on the same bed because there weren't enough beds.
The fathers of the babies gave them names of two lovers, whose love was so great it became legendary; Leyla and Mecnun. The fathers vowed that they will marry their children with each other in the future.Leyla is a rich and beautiful girl. What's making her exceptional is that despite the fact that Leyla is the only girl of a rich family, she's not as arrogant as the typical spoiled rich girl. Leyla has a pure and innocent heart with a modest character.
Mecnun is a messy person from a poor family. He also has a pure heart and has such a nice and funny character that he can't harm anyone.Both are aged 25 now. After all these years they would meet again.
Mecnun instantly fell in love with Leyla at the first sight and since that day he is doing his best to gain her heart.
With the help of Dede appearing in Mecnun's dreams and later appearing in the real world, the two lover's eternal love can keep up against the evil Arda and his father, who try to break them up.Leyla ile Mecnun is brilliant tv-series mixing comedy with drama where you will shed your tears for at some points. Together with a touchy story and enjoyable comedy, this series is one of the best comedy series ever.
